Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hello there! Welcome to the Blue Hare Inn. You must be $Name$. You can call me $NPC_20$. The town's been abuzz about the manor being filled again. Let me know if you need anything.]
[Text:Oh. How interesting. In that case, you should speak with $2$, he and his husband make excellent weapons.][Name:IntroYes]
[Text:You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.][Default][Name:5]
[Name:Collection][Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?]
[Name:JoinPartyYes][Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
